title: Re: Jill of the jungle!! is moving.
content:
How is this relevant to JotJ in any way? It's a website with no content that we've never heard of before. As KeenRush said, please stop posting irrelevant things and go discuss things like this somewhere else.[url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url]

title: Re: Jill of the jungle!! is moving.
content:
Indeed. Cut the crap, please.

If I could delete topics from this section of forums, I would.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Jill of the jungle!! is moving.
content:
Whoah, Harvey, slow down champ...

I can see you're very enthusiastic, and others perhaps need to realise you're not a bad man who's out to do damage but rather someone raised on SMS and IM, and you're getting much better - no exclamation marks or uppercase or anything.

*nods*

The website is useless in its current form though.----------------------
Support (at least partially) for 27 games!
Check out the progress of Wombat Game Tools [url=http://student.ci.qut.edu.au/~n4738667/index.php?section=wombatwip]here[/url]

title: Re: Jill of the jungle!! is moving.
content:
Am I the only one who was amused?
I mean, it's a post about the movement of a website, supposedly about a game, in fact actually having no content at all, which someone felt was important enough mentioning anyway.
I had a little laugh...

Of course I realise it wasn't intented to be funny, but it was nonetheless! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
Maybe I'm just weird...Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: hehe
content: I got the irony of it, as well, Ret.  :-)
